# se-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Type                               | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | -------- |
| `mode`   | `mode`    | Defines the inner apparance of a layout. `widget` Add a small spacing all around the container so all widgets are spaced with the same distance. `full` default. Take the full space of the container. `centered` center the container sothe content does no exceed a max width. | `"centered" \| "full" \| "widget"` | `'full'` |
